dmca.title: Music DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Google, 

I represent Stones Throw Records, LLC. I am writing to complain about a blog hosted on 

Google/Blogger which posts links to copyrighted audio on a daily basis. The website is 

located at http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/ and the owners profile is here: 

http://www.blogger.com/profile/24171670.
 
The blog at arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com consists solely of links to audio and video files of 

copyrighted works being hosted at a variety of file sharing websites - rapidshare.de, 

sendspace.com, rapidshare.corn, and others. arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com 
has repeatedly posted links to music copyrighted by my company without our permission. I 

have written to the contact given on the blog several time, first to open a dialog, and then 

asking them to cease from posting our work to the web. I have never been given a 

response. I have contacted the file sharing websites listed above, each of whom has been 

helpful in removing these files. However, arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.corn has continued 

uninterrupted and I believe that they are violating Google?s own rules as well as my 

company?s rights.

I have never written to Google with a complaint before. If Google is unwilling to remove this 

blog, I humbly ask that someone contact me clarifying Google?s policy about such blogs.

The permalinks listed below contain links to files copyrighted in part or in full by Stones 

Throw Records, LLC.

http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/10/oh-no-exodus-into-unheard-rhythms.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/10/madlib-mind-fusion-vol-5.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/10/madlib-mind-fusion-vol-4.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/10/peanut-butter-wolf-yo-45-raps.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/05/madlib-presents-dudley-perkins.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/06/stones-throw-ten-years.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/06/j-dilla-tribute-album-bonus-disc-disc.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/06/kashmere-stage-band-aint-no-sunshine.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/06/roc-c-all-questions-answered.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/07/oh-no-exodus-into-unheard-rhythmsclean_0

9.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/09/peanut-butter-wolf-presents-chrome.html
http://arnie-bossplayer.blogspot.com/2006/09/aloe-blacc-shine-through-cdlp-2006.html

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the 

allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that 

I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive 

right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank You
